articles.title: America’s spies say Iran wasn’t building a nuclear weapon. Trump dismisses that assessment - PBS
articles.description: Trump's national intelligence director, Tulsi Gabbard, told Congress in March that Iran's supreme leader had not reauthorized the dormant program.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) Tulsi Gabbard left no doubt when she testified to Congress about Iran’s nuclear program earlier this year.
The country was not building a nuclear weapon, the national intelligence di… [+4545 chars]
